timeline.message:
Fix commands on servers.

Based off the same fix I made a year or two ago...

timeline.bodyText:
You only have to fire with true. By passing false you fire the event twice.
The event is designed in a way where mod devs are expected to use the dedicated flag and handle registration for both integrated and dedicated servers in the same method.
timeline.author: i509VCB

replies.bodyText: Well rather the flag says if the server is dedicated or integrated
